class Ubuntu_Guru.apps.UbuntuGuruConfig(app_name, app_module)[source]¶

Bases: AppConfig

Configuration class for the Ubuntu_Guru Django application.

This class configures the Ubuntu_Guru application, setting the default auto field type and the application name used within the Django project.

class Ubuntu_Guru.forms.CustomUserCreationForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: UserCreationForm

Extends the default UserCreationForm to include username, email, and password fields explicitly. Used for registering new users from the frontend.

class Ubuntu_Guru.views.SignUpView(**kwargs)[source]¶
